mapper.update: update D_ACCOUNT set ACC_FUND=ACC_FUND+#{transFund} WHERE ACC_NO=#{accIn}
update D_ACCOUNT set ACC_FUND=ACC_FUND-#{transFund} WHERE ACC_NO=#{accOut}
mapper.insert: insert into D_TRANSFER(deal_no, deal_date, trans_type, trans_status, acc_out, acc_outname, acc_outbank, acc_in, acc_inname, acc_inbank, currency, trans_fund, kind) values(#{dealNo},#{dealDate},#{transType},#{transStatus},#{accOut},#{accOutName},#{accOutBank},#{accIn}, #{accInName},#{accInBank},#{currency},#{transFund},#{kind})
mapper.select: select BANK_NAME from D_BANK where BANKID=(select ACC_BANKID from D_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo})
select USER_NAME from D_USER where USER_ID=(select USER_ID from D_ACCOUNT where ACC_NO=#{accNo})
